body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping          Eating There are a variety of eating places within a 5-20 minute drive (2-15 miles) of the site. Visit the Greenwood Regional Tourism &Visitors Bureau website for a list of nearby eating places. Sleeping There are a variety of places to stay in the area. Hotels, motels, and bed and breakfasts are available nearby. Visit the Greenwood Regional Tourism & Visitors Bureau website for a list of accommodations.
title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
